verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehova <WH3068> is my light <WH216> and my salvation <WH3468>; Whom shall I fear <WH3372>? Jehovah <WH3068> is the strength <WH4581> of my life <WH2416>; Of whom shall I be afraid <WH6342>?
When evil-doers <WH7489> came <WH7126> upon me to eat up <WH398> my flesh <WH1320>, Even mine adversaries <WH6862> and my foes <WH341>, they stumbled <WH3782> and fell <WH5307>.
Though a host <WH4264> should encamp <WH2583> against me <WH3820>, My heart shall not fear <WH3372>: Though war <WH4421> should rise <WH6965> against me <WH982>, Even then will I be confident.

One <WH259> thing have I asked <WH7592> of Jehovah <WH3068>, that will I seek <WH1245> after <WH3427>; That I may dwell in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068> all the days <WH3117> of my life <WH2416>, To behold <WH2372> the beauty <WH5278> of Jehovah <WH3068>, And to inquire <WH1239> in his temple <WH1964>.

For in the day <WH3117> of trouble <WH7451> he will keep me secretly <WH6845> in his pavilion <WH5520>: In the covert <WH5643> of his tabernacle <WH168> will he hide <WH5641> me <WH7311>; He will lift me up upon a rock <WH6697>.

And now shall my head <WH7218> be lifted up <WH7311> above mine enemies <WH341> round about <WH5439> me <WH2076>. And I will offer in his tabernacle <WH168> sacrifices <WH2077> of joy <WH8643>; I will sing <WH7891>, yea <WH2167>, I will sing praises unto Jehovah <WH3068>.
Hear <WH8085>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, when I cry <WH7121> with my voice <WH6963>: Have mercy <WH2603> also upon me <WH6030>, and answer me.
When thou saidst <WH1245>, Seek ye my face <WH6440>; My heart <WH3820> said <WH559> unto thee <WH6440>, Thy face, Jehovah <WH3068>, will I seek <WH1245>.

Hide <WH5641> not thy face <WH6440> from me <WH5186>; Put not thy servant <WH5650> away <WH5186> in anger <WH639>: Thou hast been my help <WH5833>; Cast <WH5203> me not off <WH5800>, neither forsake me <WH430>, O God of my salvation <WH3468>.
When my father <WH1> and my mother <WH517> forsake <WH5800> me <WH3068>, Then Jehovah will take me up <WH622>.
Teach <WH3384> me thy way <WH1870>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; And lead <WH5148> me in a plain <WH4334> path <WH734>, Because of mine enemies <WH8324>.

Deliver <WH5414> me not over unto the will <WH5315> of mine adversaries <WH6862>: For false <WH8267> witnesses <WH5707> are risen up <WH6965> against me <WH3307>, And such as breathe out cruelty <WH2555>.
I had fainted <WH3884>, unless I had believed <WH539> to see <WH7200> the goodness <WH2898> of Jehovah <WH3068> In the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
Wait <WH6960> for Jehovah <WH3068>: Be strong <WH553>, And let thy heart <WH3820> take courage <WH2388>; Yea <WH6960>, wait thou for Jehovah <WH3068>.
